title: The Mind Virus
description: Apart from having dual nationality (her mother is Italian, her father English), Wendy is a normal eight-year-old girl. Until one day at the fish market she is struck by a terrible thought: the MIND VIRUS. Suddenly she is no longer normal. To her teachers she is troublesome. To her friends she is mad. At first Wendy assumes the virus will soon go away. But as the months and years pass it remains, strong as ever. Can Wendy make friends who will accept her? Can she finally defeat the virus?
author: Katherine E. Power
